verses.verse: Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> with their <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> their <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and all that they <S%H935>own,<s%> have come out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and <S%H776>behold,<s%> they are in the land of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>"
<S%H7097>From<s%> among his <S%H251>brothers<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H3322>presented<s%> them <S%H6440>to<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "What is your <S%H4639>occupation?<s%>" They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> both <S%H1>we,<s%> and our fathers."

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "We have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1481>live<s%> as foreigners in the <S%H776>land,<s%> for there is no <S%H4829>pasture<s%> for your <S%H5650>servants<s%>' <S%H6629>flocks.<s%> For the <S%H7458>famine<s%> is <S%H3515>severe<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> Now <S%H5650>therefore,<s%> please let your servants <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>"
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H251>brothers<s%> have come to <S%H935>you.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is before <S%H6440>you.<s%> <S%H3427>Make<s%> <S%H6440>your<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the best of the <S%H776>land.<s%> Let them <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%> If you <S%H3045>know<s%> any able <S%H582>men<s%> among <S%H7760>them,<s%> then put <S%H7760>them<s%> in <S%H8269>charge<s%> of my <S%H4735>livestock.<s%>"

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and set <S%H5975>him<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H4100>"How<s%> many are the days of the years of your <S%H3117>life?<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "The <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of my <S%H4033>pilgrimage<s%> are one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> <S%H4592>Few<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%> have been the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of my <S%H2416>life,<s%> and they have not <S%H5381>attained<s%> to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of their <S%H4033>pilgrimage.<s%>"
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3427>placed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them a <S%H272>possession<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H4315>best<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7486>Rameses,<s%> as <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3557>nourished<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and all of his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>household,<s%> with <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H2945>families.<s%>

There was no <S%H3899>bread<s%> in all the <S%H776>land;<s%> for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>severe,<s%> so that the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H3856>fainted<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H7458>famine.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> gathered <S%H3950>up<s%> all the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> for the <S%H7668>grain<s%> which they <S%H7666>bought:<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

When the <S%H3701>money<s%> was all <S%H8552>spent<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> all the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give<s%> us <S%H3899>bread,<s%> for why should we <S%H4191>die<s%> in your <S%H3701>presence?<s%> For our money <S%H656>fails.<s%>"

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give<s%> me your <S%H4735>livestock;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you food for your <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> if your <S%H3701>money<s%> is <S%H656>gone.<s%>"

They <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3899>bread<s%> in exchange for the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and for the <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and for <S%H4735>the<s%> <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and for the <S%H2543>donkeys:<s%> and he <S%H5095>fed<s%> them with <S%H3899>bread<s%> in exchange for all their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> for that <S%H8141>year.<s%>

When that <S%H8141>year<s%> was <S%H8552>ended,<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to him the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3582>him,<s%> "We will not hide from my <S%H113>lord<s%> how our <S%H3701>money<s%> is all <S%H8552>spent,<s%> and the <S%H4735>herds<s%> of <S%H929>livestock<s%> are <S%H413>my<s%> <S%H113>lord<s%>'s. There is nothing <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord,<s%> but our <S%H1472>bodies,<s%> and our <S%H127>lands.<s%>

Why should we <S%H4191>die<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> both we and our <S%H127>land?<s%> <S%H7069>Buy<s%> us and our <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and we and our <S%H127>land<s%> will be <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> us <S%H2233>seed,<s%> that we may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and not <S%H4191>die,<s%> and that the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H3456>won't<s%> be desolate."

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> all the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> for every <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> his <S%H7704>field,<s%> because the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H2388>severe<s%> on <S%H776>them,<s%> and the land became <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s.

As for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H5674>moved<s%> them to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> from one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even to the other end of <S%H7097>it.<s%>

Only <S%H7069>he<s%> <S%H127>didn't<s%> buy the land of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had a <S%H2706>portion<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> their <S%H2706>portion<s%> which <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4376>them.<s%> That is why they didn't sell their <S%H127>land.<s%>

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H7069>"Behold,<s%> I have bought you and your <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%> <S%H1887>Behold,<s%> here is <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H2232>you,<s%> and you shall sow the <S%H127>land.<s%>

It will happen at the <S%H8393>harvests,<s%> that you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3027>parts<s%> will be your <S%H2233>own,<s%> for seed of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> for your <S%H400>food,<s%> for them of your <S%H1004>households,<s%> and for <S%H398>food<s%> for your little <S%H2945>ones.<s%>"

They <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have saved our <S%H2421>lives!<s%> Let us <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord,<s%> and we will be <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants.<s%>"

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H2706>statute<s%> concerning the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> should have the <S%H2569>fifth.<s%> Only the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> alone <S%H7535>didn't<s%> become <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s.

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen;<s%> and they got themselves <S%H270>possessions<s%> <S%H6509>therein,<s%> and were fruitful, and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H6240>seventeen<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> So the days of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> the <S%H2416>years<s%> of his <S%H3967>life,<s%> were one hundred <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

The <S%H3117>time<s%> drew <S%H7126>near<s%> that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> must <S%H4191>die,<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4672>him,<s%> "If now I have found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> please <S%H7760>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> under my <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> and <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> and <S%H571>truly<s%> with <S%H6912>me.<s%> Please don't bury me in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

but when I <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with my <S%H1>fathers,<s%> you shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> me out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6912>bury<s%> me in their burying <S%H6900>place.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H1697>said.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7650>"Swear<s%> to <S%H7650>me,<s%>" and he swore to <S%H3478>him.<s%> Israel <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself on the <S%H4296>bed<s%>'s <S%H7218>head.<s%>
